1: וַיְהִ֞י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> בְּבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>were come</n> דָוִ֧ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when David</n> וַאֲנָשָׁ֛יו <sup>376 </sup> <n>and his men</n> צִֽקְלַ֖ג <sup>6860 </sup> <n>to Ziklag</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <sup>7992 </sup> <n>on the third</n> וַעֲמָלֵקִ֣י <sup>6003 </sup> <n>that the Amalekites</n> פָֽשְׁט֗וּ <sup>6584 </sup> <n>had invaded</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> נֶ֙גֶב֙ <sup>5045 </sup> <n>the south</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and on</n> צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <sup>6860 </sup> <n>and Ziklag</n> וַיַּכּוּ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smitten</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צִ֣קְלַ֔ג <sup>6860 </sup> <n>Ziklag</n> וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and burned</n> אֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>it with fire</n>
2: וַיִּשְׁבּ֨וּ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>captives</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנָּשִׁ֤ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>And had taken the women</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּהּ֙ מִקָּטֹ֣ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>or small</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> גָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>either great</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> הֵמִ֖יתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that [were] therein they slew</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not any</n> וַיִּֽנְהֲג֔וּ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>but carried [them] away</n> וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> לְדַרְכָּֽם׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>on their way</n>
3: וַיָּבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> דָוִ֤ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>So David</n> וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and his men</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to the city</n> וְהִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> שְׂרוּפָ֖ה <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and behold [it was] burned</n> בָּאֵ֑שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <sup>802 </sup> <n>and their wives</n> וּבְנֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and their sons</n> וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n> נִשְׁבּֽוּ׃ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>were taken captives</n>
4: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>that [were] with him lifted up</n> דָוִ֜ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>Then David</n> וְהָעָ֧ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֛וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קוֹלָ֖ם <sup>6963 </sup> <n>their voice</n> וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> בָּהֶ֛ם כֹּ֖חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>until they had no more power</n> לִבְכּֽוֹת׃ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>to weep</n>
5: וּשְׁתֵּ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> נְשֵֽׁי־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> דָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David's</n> נִשְׁבּ֑וּ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>were taken captives</n> אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <sup>293 </sup> <n>Ahinoam</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵלִ֔ית <sup>3159 </sup> <n>the Jezreelitess</n> וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <sup>26 </sup> <n>and Abigail</n> אֵ֖שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> נָבָ֥ל <sup>5037 </sup> <n>of Nabal</n> הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽי׃ <sup>3761 </sup> <n>the Carmelite</n>
6: וַתֵּ֨צֶר <sup>3334 </sup> <n>distressed</n> לְדָוִ֜ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> מְאֹ֗ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was greatly</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> אָמְר֤וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>spake</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for the people</n> לְסָקְל֔וֹ <sup>5619 </sup> <n>of stoning</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> מָ֙רָה֙ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>bitter</n> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him because the soul</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of all the people</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> [בְּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> ק) וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> בְּנֹתָ֑יו <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and for his daughters</n> וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>encouraged</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>but David</n> בַּיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>himself in the LORD</n> אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>his God</n> ס
7: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> דָּוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶבְיָתָ֤ר <sup>54 </sup> <n>to Abiathar</n> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priest</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> אֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <sup>288 </sup> <n>Ahimelech's</n> הַגִּֽישָׁה־ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>I pray thee bring me hither</n> נָּ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> לִ֖י הָאֵפֹ֑ד <sup>646 </sup> <n>the ephod</n> וַיַּגֵּ֧שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>brought</n> אֶבְיָתָ֛ר <sup>54 </sup> <n>And Abiathar</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֵפֹ֖ד <sup>646 </sup> <n>thither the ephod</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> דָּוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>to David</n>
8: וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>enquired</n> דָּוִ֤ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> בַּֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>at the LORD</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אֶרְדֹּ֛ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>Shall I pursue</n> אַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הַגְּדוּד־ <sup>1416 </sup> <n>army</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> הַֽאַשִּׂגֶ֑נּוּ <sup>5381 </sup> <n>for thou shalt surely</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them? And he answered</n> לוֹ֙ רְדֹ֔ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>him Pursue</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הַשֵּׂ֥ג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>overtake</n> תַּשִּׂ֖יג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>overtake</n> וְהַצֵּ֥ל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>[them] and without fail</n> תַּצִּֽיל׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>recover</n>
9: וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> דָּוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>So David</n> ה֚וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְשֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>he and the six</n> מֵא֥וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֔וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>that [were] with him and came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> נַ֣חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>to the brook</n> הַבְּשׂ֑וֹר <sup>1308 </sup> <n>Besor</n> וְהַנּֽוֹתָרִ֖ים <sup>3498 </sup> <n>where those that were left behind</n> עָמָֽדוּ׃ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stayed</n>
10: וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>pursued</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>But David</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְאַרְבַּע־ <sup>702 </sup> <n>he and four</n> מֵא֣וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>abode behind</n> מָאתַ֣יִם <sup>3967 </sup> <n>for two hundred</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> פִּגְּר֔וּ <sup>6296 </sup> <n>which were so faint</n> מֵעֲבֹ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>that they could not go over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַ֥חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>the brook</n> הַבְּשֽׂוֹר׃ <sup>1308 </sup> <n>Besor</n>
11: וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>And they found</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>an</n> מִצְרִי֙ <sup>4713 </sup> <n>Egyptian</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> וַיִּקְח֥וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and brought</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> דָּוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>him to David</n> וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> ל֥וֹ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>him bread</n> וַיֹּ֔אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and he did eat</n> וַיַּשְׁקֻ֖הוּ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>and they made him drink</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n>
12: וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And they gave</n> לוֹ֩ פֶ֨לַח <sup>6400 </sup> <n>him a piece</n> דְּבֵלָ֜ה <sup>1690 </sup> <n>of a cake</n> וּשְׁנֵ֤י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>of figs and two</n> צִמֻּקִים֙ <sup>6778 </sup> <n>clusters of raisins</n> וַיֹּ֔אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and when he had eaten</n> וַתָּ֥שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>came again</n> רוּח֖וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>his spirit</n> אֵלָ֑יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had not</n> אָ֤כַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>to him for he had eaten</n> לֶ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>no bread</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> שָׁ֣תָה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>nor drunk</n> מַ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[any] water</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> יָמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>and three</n> לֵילֽוֹת׃ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>nights</n> ס
13: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֤וֹ דָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> לְֽמִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>to whom</n> אַ֔תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וְאֵ֥י <sup>335 </sup> <n>and where</n> מִזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n> אָ֑תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and he</n> וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him To whom [belongest] thou? and whence [art] thou? And he said</n> נַ֧עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>I [am] a young man</n> מִצְרִ֣י <sup>4713 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> אָנֹ֗כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> עֶ֚בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servant</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of an</n> עֲמָֽלֵקִ֔י <sup>6003 </sup> <n>Amalekite</n> וַיַּעַזְבֵ֧נִי <sup>5800 </sup> <n>left</n> אֲדֹנִ֛י <sup>113 </sup> <n>and my master</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> חָלִ֖יתִי <sup>2470 </sup> <n>agone I fell sick</n> הַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>me because three</n>
14: אֲנַ֡חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> פָּשַׁ֜טְנוּ <sup>6584 </sup> <n>We made an invasion</n> נֶ֧גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>[upon] the south</n> הַכְּרֵתִ֛י <sup>3774 </sup> <n>of the Cherethites</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and upon [the coast] which [belongeth] to Judah</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and on</n> נֶ֣גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>and upon the south</n> כָּלֵ֑ב <sup>3612 </sup> <n>of Caleb</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צִקְלַ֖ג <sup>6860 </sup> <n>Ziklag</n> שָׂרַ֥פְנוּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and we burned</n> בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n>
15: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> הֲתוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>to him Canst thou bring me down</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַגְּד֣וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>to this company</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הִשָּׁבְעָה֩ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>Swear</n> לִּ֨י בֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto me by God</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>me nor</n> תְּמִיתֵ֗נִי <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that thou wilt neither kill</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>or</n> תַּסְגִּרֵ֙נִי֙ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>deliver</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>me into the hands</n> אֲדֹנִ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>of my master</n> וְאוֹרִֽדְךָ֖ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and I will bring thee down</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַגְּד֥וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>band</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n>
16: וַיֹּ֣רִדֵ֔הוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>And when he had brought him down</n> וְהִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> נְטֻשִׁ֖ים <sup>5203 </sup> <n>behold [they were] spread abroad</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>upon all</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> אֹכְלִ֤ים <sup>398 </sup> <n>eating</n> וְשֹׁתִים֙ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drinking</n> וְחֹ֣גְגִ֔ים <sup>2287 </sup> <n>and dancing</n> בְּכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הַשָּׁלָ֣ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>spoil</n> הַגָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>because of all the great</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> לָקְח֛וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>that they had taken</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וּמֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and out of the land</n> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n>
17: וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smote</n> דָּוִ֛ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> מֵהַנֶּ֥שֶׁף <sup>5399 </sup> <n>them from the twilight</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הָעֶ֖רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>even unto the evening</n> לְמָֽחֳרָתָ֑ם <sup>4283 </sup> <n>of the next day</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נִמְלַ֤ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>and there escaped</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and not</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not a man</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> אַרְבַּ֨ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>of them save four</n> מֵא֧וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִֽישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> נַ֛עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>young</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> רָכְב֥וּ <sup>7392 </sup> <n>which rode</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <sup>1581 </sup> <n>upon camels</n> וַיָּנֻֽסוּ׃ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled</n>

23: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>must not</n> תַעֲשׂ֥וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Ye shall not do so</n> כֵ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> אֶחָ֑י <sup>251 </sup> <n>my brethren</n> אֵ֠ת <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>with that which the LORD</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ וַיִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>us who hath preserved</n> אֹתָ֔נוּ <sup>853 </sup> וַיִּתֵּ֗ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>us and delivered</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגְּד֛וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>the company</n> הַבָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>that came</n> עָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>against us into our hand</n>
